Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes, i could preserve the hidden/known attributes of items but if there is to be a market for these characters i figured people would need to see what they were getting. also the attribute it in the playerdata, so advanced users would write decoders and get an advantage over the users that dont

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the penalty for bailing out is that you have to start all over again, which becomes a bigger and bigger issue, the deeper you are, so I think it is a good tradeoff, since there doesnt seem to be any obvious point where you can just get any unfair advantage

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Yes have sense, it's not big advantage to know what potion or ring you have if you need to grind tens of levels again
